memorycardsupported: Memory Stick, Memory Stick PRO Duo, Secure Digital (SD)  Card, Memory Stick Duo, miniSD Card, microSD Card, Secure Digital High  Capacity (SDHC) Card, Secure Digital Extended Capacity (SDXC)
marketinginformation: Don't keep your photos and HD home videos hidden away on  your computer; display them for all to see with this DPF-HD1000 10.1  digital photo frame. Store up to 4,000 2-megapixel photos, then showcase  them as single images or as beautiful slideshow presentations. You can  also display your home videos in brilliant HD image quality, plus add  background music as your slideshows and videos play. And with a  multi-card memory card slot and USB inputs, it's quick and easy to  transfer your photos from your camera or computer.
